auth.loginDescription: Enter your username and password to access the SMTP relay service dashboard
auth.loginError: An error occurred during login, please try again

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: View your SMTP relay service usage and statistics
overview.manageEmailDelivery: Manage your email delivery and monitor statistics.

credentials.title: SMTP Credentials
credentials.name: Name
credentials.deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this credential?
credentials.passwordShowOnce: This password will only be shown once. Please save it securely.
credentials.spfRecordDescription: Add a TXT record to the DNS of the sending domain (e.g. qut.edu.kg) to allow external email delivery.
credentials.dkimSignatureDescription: Generate a DKIM key pair on the {relayDomain} and add the public key TXT record to the DNS of the sending domain.
credentials.dkimSignatureDescription2: Configure Postfix to integrate DKIM signing.
credentials.reverseDnsDescription: Add a PTR record for {relayIP} pointing to {relayDomain}.
credentials.aRecordDescription: Add an A record for {relayDomain} pointing to {relayIP}.
credentials.complianceGuideDescription: Please follow the steps below to configure compliance, ensuring that your emails can be delivered successfully.
credentials.dnsRecordDescription: Add a TXT record to the DNS of the sending domain (e.g. qut.edu.kg) to allow external email delivery.
credentials.dnsRecordDescription2: Configure Postfix to integrate DKIM signing.
credentials.dnsRecordDescription3: Add a PTR record for {relayIP} pointing to {relayDomain}.
credentials.dnsRecordDescription4: Add an A record for {relayDomain} pointing to {relayIP}.
credentials.dnsRecordDescription5: Add a TXT record to the DNS of the sending domain (e.g. qut.edu.kg) to allow external email delivery.
credentials.dnsRecordDescription6: Configure Postfix to integrate DKIM signing.

logs.title: Mail Logs
logs.description: View email sending history and status
logs.subject: Subject

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences
settings.passwordShowOnce: This password will only be shown once. Please save it securely.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.password: Password must be at least 8 characters

dkim.title: DKIM Management
dkim.description: Manage your DKIM keys and DNS records
dkim.invalidDomain: Please enter a valid domain, e.g. example.com
dkim.deleteFailed: Failed to Delete DKIM Key Pair
dkim.createFailed: Failed to Create DKIM Key Pair
dkim.fetchFailed: Failed to Fetch DKIM Key List
dkim.rotateSuccess: DKIM Key Rotated Successfully, Please Update DNS Record
dkim.emptyList: No DKIM Key Pairs Yet. Click the button above to create your first key pair.
dkim.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the following DKIM key pair?
dkim.deleteIrreversible: This action cannot be undone. After deletion, this key cannot be used for DKIM signing.
dkim.dkimManagementDescription: 管理您的DKIM密钥对，配置域名邮件签名认证，提高邮件投递成功率。
